name: CreateScheduledJob
description: Creates a Scheduled Job in ServiceNow

job_name.description: The name of the Scheduled Job.

run.description: The schedule type for the job (e.g., daily, weekly, periodically).

run_time.description: The time at which the Scheduled Job runs (HH:mm:ss format).

script.description: The script to be executed when the job runs.

application.description: The application scope in which the Scheduled Job is created.

status_message.description: Message indicating whether the Scheduled Job creation was successful or not.
